text:
RepoPulse forecast (7-day breakout watchlist)

Method: reproducible baseline model using public GitHub signals (no LLM).
Breakout = +max(200 stars, +50%) within 7 days.

1) muratcankoylan/Agent-Skills-for-Context-Engineering | 94% | stars now 4496 → est 9147 (range 9114-9180)
   https://github.com/muratcankoylan/Agent-Skills-for-Context-Engineering
2) pranshuparmar/witr | 94% | stars now 6778 → est 13500 (range 13448-13552)
   https://github.com/pranshuparmar/witr
3) bellard/mquickjs | 93% | stars now 4765 → est 10611 (range 10570-10652)
   https://github.com/bellard/mquickjs
4) HKUDS/DeepTutor | 93% | stars now 516 → est 3395 (range 3370-3420)
   https://github.com/HKUDS/DeepTutor
5) nguyenphutrong/quotio | 92% | stars now 1285 → est 3402 (range 3377-3427)
   https://github.com/nguyenphutrong/quotio

Daily forecasts are logged publicly, then scored 7 days later (hits, misses, calibration).
#opensource #software #datascience #forecasting #github
